MAN.TITLE: nodes_data_structure
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: description of the data structure representing the nodes of a graph

DESCRIPTION.SP: A nodes data structure is represented by a Scilab mlist with type nodes and 3 fields:

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: graphics> A Scilab mlist data structure of type ngraphic which stores the information relative to nodes display (see ngraphic_data_structure

data A Scilab mlist data structure of type nodedata. which stores the data associated with nodes. By defaut this data structure is empty. User can add its own fields using the add_node_data function..
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.P: For a given field the associated data should be a row vector or a matrix. In the matrix case a column is associated to a node.
